definition: becoming more intricate or complex, the act of thickening
details:
adjective
- becoming more intricate or complex
= example: becoming more intricate or complex
- accumulating and becoming more intense
= synonyms: deepening
noun
- the act of thickening
= synonyms: inspissation
- any thickened enlargement
= synonyms: knob, node
- any material used to thicken
= example: any material used to thicken
= synonyms: thickener
